attributes.action: Abolish  The Pilot Pay As You Throw Schemes As Anounced Today 30/10/2007
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: and recognise that the majority of families in the U.K.already pay for their  rubbish removal as part of services we pay for in our coucil tax payment obligations. Further, recognise that council tax is already an  unfair tax and Pay As You Throw will make it even more unfair on the low paid, Families with children living at home and of course our  senior citizens the majority of which will not be able to afford what will in effect be a "Stealth Tax" bonanza for local authority "Big Spenders"

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
